title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar. The issue occurs in Build 200201151. When searching for references to the field, only 3 matches should be returned in the method getTempDir().
OB: Currently, the search results are not being selected in the external jar.
EB: After performing the search, you should be able to see 3 matches in the method getTempDir().
SR:
To resolve this issue, please ensure that you have JDK1.3.1 set as the default JRE and that you have the source for rt.jar. Then, follow these steps:
1. Open the java.io.File class.
2. Search for the field 'tmpFir'.
3. Verify that the search results are being correctly selected.
